events.name: Eid Gala and Scholarship Awards 2025
events.description: Join us for an elegant evening celebrating Eid and recognizing outstanding academic achievements within our community. The annual NED Alumni Eid Gala and Scholarship Awards is our premier social event of the year, bringing together alumni, family, and friends for networking, entertainment, and the presentation of scholarships to deserving students.
events.location: Grand Ballroom, Hilton Hotel, San Francisco
highlights: Elegant dinner celebrating Eid and academic achievement
Scholarship awards presentation to outstanding students
Special guest speakers from the community

events.name: NEDians Family and Friends Picnic
events.description: Join us for a day of fun and relaxation with family and friends. We had a wonderful time with outdoor games, delicious food, and great company. This annual event brings together our community for a day of connection and enjoyment in the beautiful outdoors.
events.location: Lake Chabot Regional Park, Castro Valley

events.name: Eid Dinner & Musical Evening with Alamgir
events.description: Join us for a musical evening with the legendary Alamgir. The event was a huge success, featuring beautiful performances, delicious traditional food, and a warm celebration of community and culture.
highlights: Live performance by legendary singer Alamgir
Traditional Eid dinner with multiple courses

events.name: 1000 Great Highway at Ocean Beach
events.description: Don't forget your beach chairs, warm clothes, and prayer mats. We had a memorable sunset gathering at Ocean Beach, with community prayers, conversations, and beautiful views of the Pacific Ocean.

events.name: NED Alumni Summer Mixer
events.description: Summer networking event for NED alumni with drinks and appetizers. Our annual mixer provided the perfect opportunity to connect with fellow alumni, share experiences, and build professional relationships in a relaxed setting.
highlights: Networking opportunities with professionals from various industries

events.name: Professional Development Workshop
events.description: Career advancement workshop featuring speakers from tech and engineering industries. This workshop provided valuable insights into career growth, technical skill development, and navigating the job market in Silicon Valley.
events.location: NED Alumni Center, Santa Clara, CA
highlights: Industry expert speakers from Google, Apple and Meta

events.name: NED Spring Festival
events.description: Annual spring celebration with cultural performances, food, and activities for families. The festival showcased our rich cultural heritage through music, dance, art, and cuisine, bringing together community members of all ages.
highlights: Cultural performances showcasing traditional music and dance
Art and craft exhibition by community members
Children's activities including face painting and games

events.name: Tech Talk: AI and the Future
events.description: Panel discussion on artificial intelligence and its impact on engineering. Leading experts from academia and industry shared insights on how AI is transforming traditional engineering disciplines and what skills will be valuable in the future job market.
highlights: Panel of AI experts from leading tech companies
Discussion on AI applications in engineering fields

events.name: NED Alumni Bowling Night
events.description: Casual bowling night for NED alumni and friends. This fun-filled evening provided a relaxed atmosphere for socializing, friendly competition, and building camaraderie among our alumni community.

events.name: New Year Gala 2024
events.description: Elegant celebration to welcome the new year with dinner and dancing. Our annual gala featured live music, gourmet dining, and a countdown celebration in a beautifully decorated venue, creating memorable moments for all attendees.
highlights: Live band and DJ for dancing
